friendLines.title: Hello
friendLines.description: Aloy here. I don't know this world, but my arrows are sharp and my bow's ready. If your party needs help, I'll do what I can.

friendLines.title: Chat: Moving Out
friendLines.description: Come on. Enough standing around, let's keep moving.

friendLines.title: Chat: Help
friendLines.description: Let's get going. There are people who need our help.

friendLines.title: When It Rains
friendLines.description: Rain. One way to wash off the grime.

friendLines.title: After the Rain
friendLines.description: Sky's running out of rain for now. Time to dry off.

friendLines.title: When It Snows
friendLines.description: The world always seems quieter when it snows.

friendLines.title: When It's Windy
friendLines.description: Wind's kicking up again. Feels good to breathe it in.

friendLines.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
friendLines.description: Wind is really whipping now. My face feels raw.

friendLines.title: Good Morning
friendLines.description: Morning. World's starting to stir again. Me too, I guess.

friendLines.title: Good Afternoon
friendLines.description: Day's half over, but we still have a lot to do.

friendLines.title: Good Evening
friendLines.description: Sunset. We'll be under the stars soon.

friendLines.title: Good Night
friendLines.description: Night's here. Time to rest, unless we're going on by starlight.

friendLines.title: About Aloy
friendLines.description: I grew up an outcast, and it wasn't much fun. Even though I'm a stranger here, people are friendlier than the tribe that was supposed to raise me. It's... nice.

friendLines.title: About Us: Action
friendLines.description: Everything I do is in the service of life, not death. That's why I'm here with you.

friendLines.title: About Us: Oath
friendLines.description: An oath seems like a formality. But if you want mine, you've got it.

friendLines.title: About Us: Moving Forward
friendLines.description: I'll do whatever it takes to finish this with you. I won't hesitate. I won't falter.

friendLines.title: Something to Share
friendLines.description: If I have to share something, it'll be my bow... in the service of people who need the help.

friendLines.title: Interesting Things
friendLines.description: This land has a past full of secrets, just like my world. I'll uncover all of it, if I have enough time.

friendLines.title: More About Aloy: I
friendLines.description: I'm not much for talking about myself. The mission is what's important.

friendLines.title: More About Aloy: II
friendLines.description: I never had parents. But a man named Rost raised me. He was stern, but kind and generous. And he trained me well. I miss him.

friendLines.title: More About Aloy: III
friendLines.description: I spent my whole life looking for my mother and never found her, not really. But I found ancient messages from the woman I was... cloned from. It felt like she knew me. And how to inspire me.

friendLines.title: More About Aloy: IV
friendLines.description: When I grew up, I didn't have any friends. Later in my travels, I made some. But I left that world before we could grow close. That's why I'm glad to have spent time with you.

friendLines.title: More About Aloy: V
friendLines.description: Trust doesn't come easy for me, but I know I can trust you. You're a true friend, and I don't say that often.

friendLines.title: Aloy's Hobbies
friendLines.description: Not sure if I have a hobby, unless you count reading things from the past. So, history... I guess?

friendLines.title: Aloy's Troubles
friendLines.description: One world needed saving. Now another. There's never time to rest.

friendLines.title: Favorite Food
friendLines.description: I'm not picky. Anything's better than traveling on an empty stomach.

friendLines.title: Least Favorite Food
friendLines.description: Had an Oseram stew once that was so thick you could pave a road with it. Ugh.

friendLines.title: Birthday
friendLines.description: Never put much stock in birthdays. Where I come from, it's a time to celebrate your mother, not yourself. Even so, I wish you a, uh... happy day.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
friendLines.description: All right. Feels like we're making progress, but we can't stop now.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
friendLines.description: Getting better. Getting stronger. Always a good thing.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
friendLines.description: No matter how good a hunter you are, you can always get better. Never rest. Never stop learning.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
friendLines.description: When we started out, you were just another stranger in a world I didn't understand. But after everything we've been through, I can say this for certain: My bow is yours, now and always.

actionLines.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
actionLines.description: These things look like they could come in handy.

actionLines.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
actionLines.description: Let's see, that looks edible... and this looks useful.

actionLines.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
actionLines.description: Who put all these things here?

actionLines.title: Low HP: II
actionLines.description: Come on, gotta find that weak spot...

actionLines.title: Heavy Hit Taken: II
actionLines.description: Should've known this wouldn't be easy...

actionLines.title: Joining Party: II
actionLines.description: I'm Aloy. Ready for the hunt.
